content.question: The image most directly reflects the belief held by many in 1788 that

choices.label: a stronger central government was a positive step
political democracy had not extended far enough
rebellions in the Caribbean had the potential to spread northward
outlawing slavery in all states was a desired goal

content.answer: a stronger central government was a positive step

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
